original: 啟稟大人，屬下已遣人對<color=#bceea7>$city1</color>假癡不癲計謀遭遇了意料之外的問題，不慎失敗了！(<color=#bceea7>假癡不癲 失敗</color>)
text: Master Qi, the subordinates have sent someone to the <color=#bceea7>$city1</color> scheme to be unpredictable and have encountered unexpected problems and accidentally failed! (<color=#bceea7>Fake infatuation does not fail</color>)
